metadata.name: Base64 MZ Header In CommandLine
metadata.comment: Detects encoded base64 MZ header in the commandline

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tvqqaamaaaaeaaaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tvpqaaiaaaaeaa8a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tvqaaaeaaaaeabaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tvoaaaaaaaaaaaaa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tvptaqeaaaaeaaaa'))))

output.summary: Detects encoded base64 MZ header in the commandline
